title: Laser dude vs His enemies

how_to_play: DON'T! Seriously... this is bad... But, if you must...
Hold shift down to move slowly
Press X to use a bomb (clears nearby bullets)
Grab the thunders* that enemies drop (when killed) to increase your power
You are only killed if the center of your belt is hit
You may graze bullets for extra points
You get an extra life every 10000 points (or 100000, not sure...)
Controls may be remapped to any key

description: This game is a bullet hell shooter. It's also quite unbalaced, by the way... It also the first(?) occurrence of my complete lack of sense for names in games...

Still, I'm quite proud of it. It's one of the few games (and the first, I believe) that I finished for no reason at all (though I later submitted it to SBGames 2013). And I really like some of the bullet patterns and the last stage's song.
